5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray Witr while riding his mount

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ عَلَى الرَّاحِلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Witr while riding
